name: Triple Kick
summary: Deals damage, and hits up to three times. Its base power will increase by 10 with each consecutive hit. It has a 72.9% of hitting 3 times, 8.1% twice, and 9% chance once.
viability: With Hitmontop's Technician, this has a base power of 90, which still isn't that good compared to Close Combat. In fact, there is only a 72.9% chance of getting that base power 90 move. It's strongly not recommended.
